title: iOS 18 May Feature All-New 'Safari Browsing Assistant'
content:
iOS 18 will feature an all-new Safari browsing assistant, according to backend code on Apple's servers discovered by Nicolás Álvarez. MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris confirmed that the code exists, but no further details are known at this time.


It is possible that the browsing assistant will be one of the several new generative AI features that are rumored to be coming to the iPhone with iOS 18. Apple is set to unveil the software update during its WWDC keynote on June 10.

More details to follow…
Related Roundup: iOS 18

This article, "iOS 18 May Feature All-New 'Safari Browsing Assistant'" first appeared on MacRumors.com
